title: Trump Pressures Ukraine to Accept a Peace Plan That Sharply Favors Russia
abstract: The U.S. proposal would freeze territory along the current front lines of the Russia-Ukraine conflict, which Ukraine has rejected.

title: Gov. Josh Shapiro: Finding Moral Clarity After an Arsonist’s Attack
abstract: This level of violence has to stop.

title: An Immigrant Held in U.S. Custody ‘Simply Disappeared’

abstract: Three users who disagreed with the site’s owner saw views for their posts plummet.

abstract: The federal judiciary is being forced to confront a fundamental question: What to do when its orders are defied?

title: Durbin, No. 2 Senate Democrat, to Retire After 44 Years in Congress
abstract: Senator Richard J. Durbin’s departure will set off a primary for a rare open Senate seat in Illinois and open a top leadership slot. He said it was time to “face reality” and make way for someone new.

abstract: The health secretary is ratcheting up his campaign against the food industry.

abstract: America needs to figure out how to dominate the industries of the future. Call me a “Waymo Democrat.”

abstract: The victims — Tanya Denise Jackson and her daughter, Tatiana Marie Dykes — were found on Long Island, near the area where a serial killer operated.

abstract: There’s no better opponent than one who repeatedly trips over his shoelaces.

abstract: A single image captures the subtle changes in how the Roman Catholic Church buries a pope.

abstract: The news program has faced mounting pressure from both President Trump and its corporate ownership at Paramount, the parent company of CBS News.

abstract: More than 20 vehicles in a town on Cape Ann, Mass., have been damaged by a woodpecker in mating season. “You still see him out here,” one resident said. “Peck, peck, peck, peck.”

abstract: When a private meeting goes unexpectedly.

abstract: Remarks by President Trump and his Treasury secretary fueled a rebound in markets, highlighting how Wall Street is influenced by news about the White House’s policy intentions.

abstract: President Trump’s approval rating has sunk to about 45 percent, down from 52 percent one week after he took office.

abstract: The homeland security secretary was dining at a Washington, D.C., restaurant. She also lost her passport and keys.

abstract: Despite a 1 percent increase in 2024, U.S. birthrates remained in a historic slump, a trend that worries demographers and cultural critics.

abstract: Growing case numbers suggest that the national total will surpass that seen during the last large outbreak in 2019.

abstract: Every year for nearly two decades, the small city of Rock Port has been producing more electricity from wind energy than it needs.

abstract: A professional skeptic, he took on hundreds of mysteries, offering rational explanations for the Loch Ness monster, the Shroud of Turin and countless hauntings.
